      • useBuckBinaryHash

        public boolean useBuckBinaryHash()
        Whether Buck should use Buck binary hash or git commit id as the core key in all rule keys.

        The binary hash reflects the code that can affect the content of artifacts.

        By default git commit id is used as the core key.

        Returns a lazily initialized value of the useBuckBinaryHash attribute. Initialized once and only once and stored for subsequent access with proper synchronization.

        Overrides:
        useBuckBinaryHash in class AbstractBuildBuckConfig
        Returns:
        A lazily initialized value of the useBuckBinaryHash attribute
